original_title: Bette Midler: Kiss My Brass Live at Madison Square Garden
overview: Bette Midler hit the road for the first time in four years with her 2003â€“2004 Kiss My Brass concert tour, performing well-known hits and characters, as well as selected songs from her release, Bette Midler Sings the Rosemary Clooney Songbook.  The tour hit the top 40 cities across the U.S. with one stop in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.  10 Australian dates were added in April and May 2005. It was the first Australian tour for Midler in 26 years. This program was recorded 18th January 2004 at Madison Square Gardens.
tagline: It's time to Kiss my Brass!
title: Bette Midler: Kiss My Brass Live at Madison Square Garden
